segments.text: I observe the woman in the kitchen, diligently polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be in a world of her own, completely absorbed in the task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture suggests a routine, a familiar chore she's performed countless times.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost beautiful, this single-minded focus on a simple act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, this intense concentration blinds her to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm utterly surprised she hasn't felt the cold water seeping into her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's practically a river flowing over her foot, yet her expression remains perfectly calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her face is so neutral, devoid of any hint of alarm or awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is right in front of her, impossible to miss, you'd think.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only imagine the shock when she finally looks down or turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That moment of realization is going to be quite something to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This quiet obliviousness makes the scene almost comical, in a dark way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a testament to how deeply ingrained habits can make us miss the obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR
